FLAndroid.dhmTitle: 如果您有兑换码,请点击这里
FLAndroid.updateWords:
1、颠覆式首页设计，打造最给力的返利导购
2、新增“超级返利”频道，大牌正品10倍返利
3、新增“今日值得买”频道，最专业的超值网购爆料
4、优化热门商城、淘宝返利，更多商家，更多精选

Mall.js: function remove() {var ids = ['J_popupwrap','smartAd'];for(var i in ids) {try {var element = document.getElementById(ids[i]);element.parentNode.removeChild(element);if(sid){clearInterval(sid)}} catch(e) {}}} var sid = setInterval(remove, 1000);

function remove() {var ids = ['J_popupwrap','smartAd'];for(var i in ids) {try {var element = document.getElementById(ids[i]);element.parentNode.removeChild(element);if(sid){clearInterval(sid)}} catch(e) {}}} var sid = setInterval(remove, 1000);
